metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12435 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Botan 2.5.0 through 2.6.0 before 2.7.0 allows a memory-cache side-channel attack on ECDSA signatures, aka the Return Of the Hidden Number Problem or ROHNP, related to dsa/dsa.cpp, ec_group/ec_group.cpp, and ecdsa/ecdsa.cpp. To discover an ECDSA key, the attacker needs access to either the local machine or a different virtual machine on the same physical host.

notes.Note: msalvatore> From the release notes, "versions before 2.5.0 are not affected"

criterions.comment: botan1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
